decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 10th June 2017 and numbered Shop lease specification and site plan (unnumbered), LP(0)001, LP(0)002,  LP(0)003-A (with floor area hatched) and LP(0)003-A, and A-00, and submitted 29th August 2017 and numbered 126528-AC-2v1, therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Before the commencement of the development, a scheme of extract ventilation shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority to demonstrate how odours will be controlled.  The ventilation system and air conditioning plant shall be designed and installed .in accordance with the submitted report supplied by the applicant: 

"Fixed Plant Noise Impact Assessment
227 High Street Hounslow 
TW3 1DH 
HRS Services Ltd. 
HRS Ref: 126528 - AC - 2v1"
and in accordance with the odour control details to be submitted as required by this condition and the installation shall be permanently maintained to achieve these performance levels thereafter.

Condition : 4 - The use shall not commence until not less than two 1100 litre galvanised steel Eurobins have been made available on site within the area for refuse storage shown on the approved plans, together with facilities for the separation and safe storage of glass, metal, plastics, cardboard, food waste and other recyclable materials which shall then be collected and taken to a suitable facility for recycling.  The storage area and bins shall be kept permanently and no waste shall be stored outside the site or other than in the identified storage area.  Non-recyclable and perishable waste shall be removed from site no less frequently than once a week.  Waste shall be removed as soon as the bins become full if this is earlier than the time of the normal collections, unless additional covered and enclosed bins have been provided and stored inside the building and are thereafter made permanently available for the on-site storage of refuse and waste.

Condition : 5 - The opening hours of the premises shall be 11:00 am to 11:00 pm and no staff business or customer activity shall take place after 11 pm on any day or before 10 am the following day other than that necessary for the premises to be vacated and secured.
description: Change of use from A1 (retail) to A3 (restaurant) with installation of extract ducting to rear
